com.amplifyframework.core

Class AmplifyConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.core.AmplifyConfiguration

  • public final class AmplifyConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    AmplifyConfiguration serves as the top-level configuration object for the Amplify framework. It is usually populated from amplifyconfiguration.json. Contains all configurations for all categories and plugins used by system.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AmplifyConfiguration.Builder
      Builder for AmplifyConfiguration with an option to specify additional platforms.

    • Method Detail

      • fromJson

        public static AmplifyConfiguration fromJson(org.json.JSONObject json)
                                     throws AmplifyException
        Build an AmplifyConfiguration directly from an JSONObject. Users should prefer loading from resources files via fromConfigFile(Context), or fromConfigFile(Context, int).
        Parameters:
        json - A JSON object
        Returns:
        An AmplifyConfiguration
        Throws:
        AmplifyException - If the JSON does not represent a valid AmplifyConfiguration

                                           throws AmplifyException

        Parameters:
        context - Context needed for reading JSON file
        Returns:
        An Amplify configuration instance
        Throws:
        AmplifyException - If there is a problem in the config file

        public boolean isDevMenuEnabled()
